ABILITIES:
- Burrow -
Start the round burrowed underground. While burrowed, become untargetable and immune to damage. These animals will come out on their own

- Surround -
This animal moves around the campfire, enclosing it, instead of taking a straight path

- Dung Roller -
This animal is an expert at rolling Dung Balls. The more they roll the more the balls grow. Once in range, the Dung Ball will be shot at the campfire dealing +50 dmg.

- Hop -
This animal hops around instead of having a consistent movement speed

- Explosive Acorn -
This animal sets up explosive acorns and runs away. If it get out of sight before it dies the acorn will detonate, dealing +25 dmg.

- Thorns -
After getting in range, this animal will cover itself, becoming Unhittable and dealing +15 dmg when it gets struck by On-Hit Effects

- Unhittable -
This animal can be immune to On-Hit Effects (except for Armor Penetration)

- Thief -
This animal has different goals in mind. Instead of trying to damage you, it will steal +100 embers. You can recover them by killing it before it gets out of sight

- Stink Spray -
Attacks will stun the campfire for 0.75s. Stun effects override eachother instead of stacking.

- Charge -
Begins the round by charging a powerfull first attack that deal 2x damage

- Ranged -
Has increased range and is able to damage you from afar

- Wolf Pack -
For each 4 wolves in the campsite, 1 will be considered the Alpha. If the Alpha dies and there aren't enough on the field, the role will be transfered to other wolves

- Alpha -
When an Alpha howls, it taunts the campfire and activates nearby wolves. Activated wolves gain x2.5 movement speed, +0.25 Armor Penetration and +50 Dmg

- Honey Pot -
Whenever it gets below half Max HP it starts to consume Honey. Each scoop of Honey heals for +1000HP. It only stops consuming once its Full Health or it dies

- Stray -
Stray wolves are used to living alone and are always activated

- Stunning Bite -
Attacks stun the campfire for 0.75 seconds. Stun effects override eachother instead of stacking

- Charge -
Begins the round by charging a powerful first attack. Each charge increases the first attack's power by +25 damage

- Caretaker -
Heals nearby animals 7 times for +100HP every time it howls. This doesn't apply to itself or other animals of the same species

- Protector -
Protects nearby animals 7 times with +100 Armor every time it howls. This doesn't apply to itself or other animals of the same species
